price: A kad bismo malo patnju otklonili, vi biste se sigurno u nevjerovanje vratili;
arabic: إِنَّا كَاشِفُواْ ٱلۡعَذَابِ قَلِيلًاۚ إِنَّكُمۡ عَآئِدُونَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: innā kāshifū al-ʿadhābi qalīlan innakum ʿāidūna
